title: How do I connect my phone to a Wi-Fi network?
answer:
1. Go to Settings. Touch Wi-Fi. 

 2. Turn on Wi-Fi to search for Wi-Fi networks in range. 

 3. If Wi-Fi is turned on, your phone automatically searches for available Wi-Fi networks. 

 4. For free network,clicking the desired network,phone will connect automaticly. 

 5. For encryption , touch the desired network. In the displayed dialog box, enter the password for the Wi-Fi network, and touch Connect. 

 6. When the connection is set up, you will be able to use the Wi-Fi network to access the Internet. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111409)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111410)
